sentences.en: Ambrosia had pushed Edgar and the girl in there with admonition to have some fun.
sentences.cn: 安布罗西娅把埃德加和姑娘往里边一推,还劝告他们寻欢作乐.
后来阿芙洛狄特亲自带了仙肴.

sentences.en: She is at present gone for the best nectar and ambrosia to regale me this evening.
sentences.cn: 她今晚为款待我,现在又去准备美酒佳肴去了.

sentences.en: Tony sipped from his glass. "Mmm. Ambrosia. Nectar of the gods. Divine. Wonderful."
sentences.cn: 托尼从杯中抿了一口感叹道：“哇，人间美味啊，神灵的琼浆玉液呀，天赐之物，太棒了。”

words.tran_cn: 适用于神的（等于ambrosial）；美味的

trans.tran_cn: （希腊罗马神话中）神仙的食物，美味食品，蜂食
trans.tran_en: In Greek mythology, ambrosia is the food of the gods
